mechanics.condition: Area is dim light AND target within 60 feet
mechanics.outcome: Treat dim light as bright light

mechanics.condition: Area is darkness AND target within 60 feet

mechanics.trigger: Score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack
mechanics.outcome: Roll one additional weapon damage die and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit

mechanics.condition: Player is a Half-Orc AND is not killed outright AND has not used Relentless Endurance since the last long rest
mechanics.outcome: Player drops to 1 hit point instead
Gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill
